tuv.seg: After your baby is born
I ndiaidh breith do linbh
Registering the birth of your baby
Breith do linbh a chlárú
An outline of how to register the birth of your baby in Ireland
Ní mór duit breith do linbh a chlárú laistigh de thrí mhí ón am a rugadh é nó í
Postnatal care for your baby
Cúram iarbhreithe do do naíonán
An introductory document to postnatal care for your baby
Cáipéis tosaithe do chúram iarbhreithe do do naíonán
Your health after birth
Do Shláinte tar éis na Breithe
An outline of postnatal supports available to women in Ireland who have given birth
Imlíne ar fhadhbanna sláinte agus ar thacaíochta iarbhreithe in Éirinn
Maternity care and the public health nurse
Cúram máithreachais agus an bhanaltra sláinte phoiblí
An outline of the post natal care provided by the public health nurse service
An ról atá ag an mbanaltra sláinte phoiblí i dtaobh seirbhísí máthaireachais
The Department of Health in Ireland always recommend the benefits of breastfeeding for babies
Imlíne ar an gcabhair atá ar fáil do mhná in Éirinn ar mian le beathú cíche a thabhairt
Supports for postnatal depression
Tacaíochtaí do dhúlagar iarbhreithe
There are supports available for women with postnatal depression
Tá tacaíochtaí ar fáil do mhná ag fulaingt ó dhúlagar iarbhreithe
Advice and contact information to help you through this difficult time
Comhairle agus eolas teagmhála chun cabhrú leat i rith na tréimhse deacra seo
The Parental Leave Act 1998 as amended by the Parental Leave (Amendment) Act 2006 allows parents to take parental leave in respect of certain children
Ceadaíonn an tAcht um Shaoire do Thuismitheoirí 1998, agus é leasaithe ag an Acht um Shaoire do Thuismitheoirí (Leasú) 2006, saoire tuismitheora do thuismitheoirí i leith leanaí áirithe a fháil
This document is in: Employment > Employment rights and conditions > Leave and holidays
This document is in: Fostaíocht > Cearta agus Coinníollacha Oibre > Saoire agus laethanta saoire
Information about statutory paternity leave, which is available from September 2016
Faisnéis faoi shaoire atharthachta reachtúil a bheidh ar fáil d’aithreacha nua ó Mheán Fómhair 2016
This document is in: Employment > Employment rights and conditions > Leave and holidays
This document is in: Fostaíocht > Cearta agus Coinníollacha Oibre > Saoire agus laethanta saoire
Child Benefit is a payment to the parents or guardians of children under 16 years of age, or under 18 years of age if the child is in full-time education or has a disability

Is íocaíocht Stáit é Sochar Linbh a íoctar le tuismitheoirí nó le caomhnóirí leanaí atá faoi 16 bliana d'aois, nó faoi 18 bliana d'aois má bhíonn an leanbh in oideachas lánaimseartha nó má tá an leanbh faoi mhíchumas
This document is in: Social Welfare > Social welfare payments > Families and children
This document is in: Leas Sóisialach > Íocaíochtaí Leasa Shóisialaigh > Íocaíochtaí Leasa Shóisialaigh le Teaghlaigh agus le Leanaí
Most Read in "Family and Relationships"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Teaghlach agus Caidrimh"
Registrars of Births, Marriages and Deaths
Leanaí agus cearta in Éirinn
Barring, safety and protection orders
Orduithe Urchoisc, Sábháilteachta agus Cosanta
